title: PharmaCheck
description: An intelligent pharmacy assistant that delivers accurate medicine details and real-time price comparisons from FDA-approved sources.

title: TruChain
description: A decentralized Ethereum-based system designed for transparent and tamper-proof supply chain tracking.

title: DeBlogger
description: A decentralized blogging platform deployed on Ethereum's Sepolia testnet, enabling censorship-resistant publishing.

title: MintPod
description: An in-browser NFT deployment tool using ERC-721 and MetaMask, allowing users to mint and launch NFT collections effortlessly.

title: HisabPro
description: An all-in-one web app for inventory, sales, and analytics management tailored for small businesses.

title: Samachar
description: A real-time Discord bot that delivers bite-sized news headlines from Inshorts with interactive navigation

title: E-Wallet
description: A lightweight Chrome extension wallet for Ethereum (Sepolia Testnet), built with React and Vite for seamless crypto management.

title: RayTracer
description: A basic raytracer built entirely in Python, showcasing light physics with reflections, refractions, and shadows.

title: FlickTube
description: A responsive YouTube clone built with React.js and YouTube v3 API, offering dynamic search and video playback.
